content: -------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------- **gothic lace cowl or scarf** - by emily wessel ============ -------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------- *learn to knit lace today the free gothic lace cowl or scarf is specifically designed for beginners it s simple satisfying and quick - perfect for getting started with lace * *with this free pattern and our in-depth tutorial 1 you ll learn how to read a chart how to work lace increases like yo and decreases like ssk k2tog and sl1-k2tog-psso * **want to keep up with tin can knits ** sign up for our email updates 2 and we will let you know about our new designs 3 and great in-depth tutorials 4 ---------------------------------------------- ---------------------------------------------- **pattern info** ============ **sizing** short long cowl measures approximately 10 inches wide by 22 44 inches long before blocking scarf measures approximately 8 inches wide by 60 inches long after blocking the piece will grow somewhat depending on yarn choice and how aggressively you block the lace **yarn** worsted / aran weight yarn 200 yds for short cowl 400 yds for long cowl or scarf * sample shown malabrigo worsted 5 in frost grey * **needles** us #8 / 5 0 mm * or as required to meet gauge * *note gauge is not critical for this project* **gauge** 18 sts and 22 row/ 4 in stockinette stitch **notions** stitch markers darning needle **helpful tutorials** let s knit lace 6 how to read a knitting chart 7 -------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------- for all pattern abbreviations techniques and to contact us visit www tincanknits com 8 -------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------- 1 http //blog tincanknits com/2014/06/06/lets-knit-lace/ 2 www tincanknits com 3 http //eepurl com/k5p8l 4 www tincanknits com 5 http //www ravelry com/yarns/library/malabrigo-yarn-worsted 6 http //blog tincanknits com/2014/06/06/lets-knit-lace/ 7 http //blog tincanknits com/2014/06/06/how-to-read-a-knitting-chart/ 8 http //tincanknits com/
